definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="1" y="-2"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="wait"><value name="ticks"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">45</field></block></value><statement name="do"><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="entity_isalive"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="entity_despawn"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><next><block type="explode"><field name="mode">TNT</field><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value><value name="power"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">2</field></block></value><next><block type="explode"><field name="mode">NONE</field><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value><value name="power"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">4</field></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></statement></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
